Title: Famous people, famous words -- Li Dazhao
Publisher: Neimenggu daxue chubanshe (内蒙古大学出版社)
Notes: "Famous people, famous words" is an educational series from 1996, presenting a number of famous persons, both Chinese and foreign, and their famous utterances. This quote from Li Dazhao, one of the founders of the CCP, reads: "Knowledge is the lamp that guides life to the realm of light and truth" (知识是引导人生到光明与真实境界的灯烛).
